about_the_game:
Caste is a cross-platform 2D MMORPG in retro style pixel art. Join a fantasy online world with many other players. Build your house and place furniture inside. Build your farm with a huge variety of crops! Sell your harvest and buy new furniture or clothes.

Features

  • Play live online with many other players
  • Create your own Caste or join an existing one
  • Complete quests
  • Buy a lot to build your own house on
  • Housing and placing furniture
  • Loot trees
  • Style your character
  • Cloth your character
  • Day / night depending on the server time
